name: Halloween Pocket Deck
description:
👻👻👻 Halloween Pocket Deck is a small project of mine, and actually the first game I ever finished to the very end. I dropped a lot of projects because I was always chasing for something sparkly in new, blank and fresh page. 👻👻👻

This is a simple card game, where you fight Halloween monsters, use candy to heal yourself and some items to skip turn. 

Hope you enjoy it as much as I was enjoying making it :D

Happy Halloween ! 🎃🕸️🕷️🦇👻

Instructions:

1 - Download your package

2 - Extract 

3 - Open .exe with name Halloween Pocket Deck
